publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4230 Angela Constance: West Lothian Half Marathon—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers and participants of the first ever West Lothian half marathon; acknowledges that the half marathon was successful in raising money for a number of local charitable organisations; applauds the organisers for their efforts in attracting runners of all abilities through a separate relay event in addition to the half marathon; welcomes the added health benefits that marathons bring to communities by promoting healthy living and exercise, and wishes the half marathon every success in the years to come. Supported by : Stuart McMillan*, Aileen Cam pbell*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Kidd*, John Lam ont*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ian McKee*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-4230 West Lothian Half Marathon (lodged on 26 May 2009) Robin Harper*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*, Jim Tolson*

S3M-4230 Angela Constance: West Lothian Half Marathon—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers and participants of the first ever West Lothian half marathon; acknowledges that the half marathon was successful in raising money for a number of local charitable organisations; applauds the organisers for their efforts in attracting runners of all abilities through a separate relay event in addition to the half marathon; welcomes the added health benefits that marathons bring to communities by promoting healthy living and exercise, and wishes the half marathon every success in the years to come. Supported by: Stuart McMillan, Aileen Campbell, Stewart Maxwell, Bill Kidd, John Lamont, Joe FitzPatrick, Ian McKee, Kenneth Gibson, Robin Harper, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Sandra White, Gil Paterson, Jim Tolson
S3M-4230 West Lothian Half Marathon (lodged on 26 May 2009) Michael Matheson*
